backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining menu items, orders, bookings, user profiles, statuses, Stripe config, and access control with initial state and storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation describing features, setup, tech stack, and Razorpay-based payment configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining routes, layout, auth guards, and providers using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context for cart state with localStorage persistence, item management, and total calculations.
frontend/src/cart/cartStorage.ts: Utility for serializing and deserializing cart data with BigInt-safe JSON handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/DevResetSe: Provides a destructive admin-only dialog to reset all application data after typing RESET for confirmation.
frontend/src/components/admin/KpiCard.ts: Displays a KPI value with an icon, title, and optional description in a card layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/RequireAdm: Checks admin status and either renders children or shows an access-denied message.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout and displays a button that reflects authentication state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Requires user authentication and shows a login prompt if the user is not signed in.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Renders a badge displaying booking status based on the status variant object.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders site footer with links, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Top navigation bar with dynamic links, login button, cart count, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuItemCar: Shows menu item details, availability, price, and an optional add-to-cart button.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuSkeleto: Displays a grid of skeleton loaders for menu items while data is loading.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrderStat: Renders a badge showing order status with labels and variants based on status fields.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: UI dialog for configuring Stripe by submitting a secret key and allowed countries, with validation and mutation to save settings.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useBookingA: Provides a mutation to update booking status and refresh related queries with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useDevReset: Implements a dev reset mutation placeholder that clears client state and logs out, but currently always errors due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useMenuAdmi: Defines mutations to add, update, and delete menu items, invalidating menu-related queries and showing toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useOrderAdm: Mutation hook to update order status and refresh order-related queries with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useOrderPay: Mutation for updating an order’s payment reference and status while invalidating order queries and handling errors.
frontend/src/hooks/payments/useCreateChe: Creates a Stripe checkout session unless COD-only mode is enabled, handling URL construction and specific error cases.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthRedirect.ts: Manages storing and redirecting to intended routes after authentication using session storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login state, identity loading, and logout through AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks for admin checks, menu data, orders, bookings, dashboard metrics, and Stripe configuration using an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base styling for borders and body colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing metrics, payment setup, order and booking status controls, and alerts for payment configuration.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MenuAdminPage.t: Admin page for listing, adding, editing, and deleting menu items with a form dialog and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/pages/BookChefPage.tsx: Provides a form for users to submit chef booking requests, handling validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/BookingsPage.tsx: Displays the user's chef bookings with loading states, empty-state UI, and sorted booking details.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Manages the shopping cart UI and checkout flow, creating orders after validating user input and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutWaitPage.tsx: Polls order status after checkout, manages timeout and payment method selection, and handles transitions like confirmation or rejection.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero section, feature cards, and navigation buttons for browsing the menu or booking the chef.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Fetches menu items and categories, groups items by category, and displays them with tabs, loading states, error handling, and add‑to‑cart logic.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's past orders with status badges, totals, timestamps, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with navigation options to view orders or continue browsing.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Handles Stripe session verification, updates order payment reference, and displays a payment success confirmation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and optionally removing them from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings while enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, including features, new feature requests, metadata, and configuration for the HomeChef Kitchen project.
